name: Chris Phillips
title: IBM Master Inventor
bio: Chris is a world leader in designing large scale API environments for large institutions. Whether working with Open Banking or enabling new channels in the API Economy, Chris has designed and implemented solutions. Based in IBMâ€™s UK Hursley Lab, Chris is one of the youngest IBM Master Inventors. When he is not neck deep in large scale designs, Chris tinkers and plays with APIs to drive his home automation system, much to the annoyance of his wife and children
